column1: Kata Robata////The true winner here is
column3: the lobster mac and cheese.  Yeah
column4: I know it's a Japanese restaurant and this dish is anything but.  However
column5: I'm a connoisseur of "gourmet" mac and cheese and this was definitely one of the best I've ever had.  The serving is large enough for an entree but is very rich so you might want to share it and then eat some other less rich food with it.  It is creamy
column7: the lobster in it is perfectly cooked
column8: and it's adorably plated with the lobster shells.
